labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: "Reject Call" button won't work, but clicking the "Accept Call" button makes the Discord cilent unresponsive.
data.expected_result: Either the call will be disappear, or rejectable.
data.short_description: Gets an call notification, close the DM without rejecting it, can't reject but can accept, but cilent will be unresponsive.
data.steps_to_repro: - Wait for a call from other account. - While the notification is on, close the DM. - Click the red button (reject button), not working - Click the green button (accept button), Discord will be unresponsive
